name: docker
description: Integrate with Docker to manage containers, images, volumes, and networks.

examples.title: Deploy an nginx container
examples.description: Deploy an nginx container exposing it on port 9000
examples.prompt: name: `nginx`, containers: "deploy an nginx container exposing it on port 9000"

examples.title: Deploy a WordPress and MySQL container
examples.description: Deploy a WordPress container and a supporting MySQL container, exposing WordPress on port 9000
examples.prompt: name: `wordpress`, containers: "deploy a WordPress container and a supporting MySQL container, exposing Wordpress on port 9000"
